hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select eiid, eid, eLabel, eName, eiLabel, eCategory, eiVersion, eiNumber, eiName, eiType, substr(eiSort,16) eiSort, eiDense, storageWay, storageLocation, isDownload, department, managermentPerson, content, userName from (select b.EID eId, a.ELABEL eLabel, a.ENAME eName, b.EILABEL eiLabel, b.EIID eiid, a.ECATEGORY eCategory, b.EIVERSION eiVersion, (select e.ORGNAME from ORGANIZATION e where e.ORGSYSCODING = b.EIORGSYSCODING) department, (select d.CIVALUE from soc0109 c,SOC0107 d where c.CID=d.CID and c.EID=a.EID and b.EIID=d.EIID and c.CNAME='文档编号' and d.CIVERSION = b.EIVERSION) eiNumber, b.EINAME eiName, b.EIUSERNAME userName, (select d.CIVALUE from soc0109 c,SOC0107 d where c.CID=d.CID and c.EID=a.EID and b.EIID=d.EIID and c.CNAME='文档类型' and d.CIVERSION = b.EIVERSION) eiType, (select d.CIVALUE from soc0109 c,SOC0107 d where c.CID=d.CID and c.EID=a.EID and b.EIID=d.EIID and c.CNAME='文档分类' and d.CIVERSION = b.EIVERSION) eiSort, (select d.CIVALUE from soc0109 c,SOC0107 d where c.CID=d.CID and c.EID=a.EID and b.EIID=d.EIID and c.CNAME='文档密级' and d.CIVERSION = b.EIVERSION) eiDense, (select d.CIVALUE from soc0109 c,SOC0107 d where c.CID=d.CID and c.EID=a.EID and b.EIID=d.EIID and c.CNAME='存储方式' and d.CIVERSION = b.EIVERSION) storageWay, (select d.CIVALUE from soc0109 c,SOC0107 d where c.CID=d.CID and c.EID=a.EID and b.EIID=d.EIID and c.CNAME='存放位置' and d.CIVERSION = b.EIVERSION) storageLocation, (select d.CIVALUE from soc0109 c,SOC0107 d where c.CID=d.CID and c.EID=a.EID and b.EIID=d.EIID and c.CNAME='是否可下载' and d.CIVERSION = b.EIVERSION) isDownload, b.EINAME managermentPerson, b.EIDESC content from soc0117 a,soc0118 b where a.EID = b.EID and a.EID = 'CM13000000') t where 1=1

select count(*) from (select b.EID eId, a.ELABEL eLabel, a.ENAME eName, b.EILABEL eiLabel, b.EIID eiid, a.ECATEGORY eCategory, b.EIVERSION eiVersion, (select e.ORGNAME from ORGANIZATION e where e.ORGSYSCODING = b.EIORGSYSCODING) department, (select d.CIVALUE from soc0109 c,SOC0107 d where c.CID=d.CID and c.EID=a.EID and b.EIID=d.EIID and c.CNAME='文档编号' and d.CIVERSION = b.EIVERSION) eiNumber, b.EINAME eiName, b.EIUSERNAME userName, (select d.CIVALUE from soc0109 c,SOC0107 d where c.CID=d.CID and c.EID=a.EID and b.EIID=d.EIID and c.CNAME='文档类型' and d.CIVERSION = b.EIVERSION) eiType, (select d.CIVALUE from soc0109 c,SOC0107 d where c.CID=d.CID and c.EID=a.EID and b.EIID=d.EIID and c.CNAME='文档分类' and d.CIVERSION = b.EIVERSION) eiSort, (select d.CIVALUE from soc0109 c,SOC0107 d where c.CID=d.CID and c.EID=a.EID and b.EIID=d.EIID and c.CNAME='文档密级' and d.CIVERSION = b.EIVERSION) eiDense, (select d.CIVALUE from soc0109 c,SOC0107 d where c.CID=d.CID and c.EID=a.EID and b.EIID=d.EIID and c.CNAME='存储方式' and d.CIVERSION = b.EIVERSION) storageWay, (select d.CIVALUE from soc0109 c,SOC0107 d where c.CID=d.CID and c.EID=a.EID and b.EIID=d.EIID and c.CNAME='存放位置' and d.CIVERSION = b.EIVERSION) storageLocation, (select d.CIVALUE from soc0109 c,SOC0107 d where c.CID=d.CID and c.EID=a.EID and b.EIID=d.EIID and c.CNAME='是否可下载' and d.CIVERSION = b.EIVERSION) isDownload, b.EINAME managermentPerson, b.EIDESC content from soc0117 a,soc0118 b where a.EID = b.EID and a.EID = 'CM13000000') t where 1=1

select 1 as id, pr.closetime as propentime , sum(case when pr.prpdid like '01080%' then 1 else 0 end) as incidentnum, sum(case when pr.prpdid like '01083%' then 1 else 0 end) as problemnum, sum(case when pr.prpdid like '01084%' then 1 else 0 end) as changenum, sum(case when pr.prpdid like '01100%' then 1 else 0 end) as servicenum, sum(case when pr.prpdid like '01102%' then 1 else 0 end) as sfnum from (select substr(pr.prclosetime,6,2) as closetime, substr(pr.prclosetime,1,8) as prclosetime, pr.prpdid as prpdid from ig500 pr where prstatus = 'C') pr where 1=1

select u.USERNAME as userName,ppuserid as userID , (select sum(1) from (select prid,ppusername,ppuserid from ig677 where prpdid like '01080%' and propentime like :propentime and ppproctime is not null and ppstatus = 'W' group by prid,ppusername,ppuserid) h where h.ppuserid = a.ppuserid ) as incidentNum, (select sum(1) from (select prid,ppusername,ppuserid from ig677 where prpdid like '01083%' and propentime like :propentime and ppproctime is not null and ppstatus = 'W' group by prid,ppusername,ppuserid) h where h.ppuserid = a.ppuserid ) as problemNum, (select sum(1) from (select prid,ppusername,ppuserid from ig677 where prpdid like '01084%' and propentime like :propentime and ppproctime is not null and ppstatus='Q' group by prid,ppusername,ppuserid) h where h.ppuserid = a.ppuserid ) as changeNum, (select sum(1) from (select prid,ppusername,ppuserid from ig677 where prpdid like '01101%' and propentime like :propentime and ppproctime is not null and ppstatus = 'U' group by prid,ppusername,ppuserid) h where h.ppuserid = a.ppuserid) as serviceNum, (select sum(1) from (select prid,ppusername,ppuserid from ig677 where prpdid like '01102%' and propentime like :propentime and ppproctime is not null and ppstatus = 'Y' group by prid,ppusername,ppuserid) h where h.ppuserid = a.ppuserid) as developNum from ig677 a join IGUSER u on a.PPUSERID=u.USERID where 1=1
select 3 id, 1 label, 2 value from iguser t
select ORGID id,ORGNAME label,ORGSYSCODING value from Organization t where ORGPAR = 0002001017

select syscoding typeId, cvalue typeName, sum(1) as totalnum, sum(case when rldesc = '审核通过' and backname = '驳回次数' and backnum = '0' then 1 else 0 end) as passnum, sum(case when pivarvalue = '成功' then 1 else 0 end ) as successnum from ( select d.prid as prid , d.pruserid as pruserid , d.prusername as prusername , d.prclosetime as prclosetime , d.cvalue as cvalue , f.pivarvalue as pivarvalue , e.rldesc as rldesc , e.psname as psname, d.syscoding as syscoding, f.pivarname as pivarname, h.pivarname as backname, h.pivarvalue as backnum from ( select a.prid as prid,a.pruserid,a.prusername, a.propentime as prclosetime,c.cvalue,pivarvalue,c.syscoding from ig500 a left join ig599 b on a.prid = b.prid left join CODEDETAILDEF c on syscoding = substr(pivarvalue,1,6) where prpdid like '01084%' and b.pivarname in ('变更类型') and a.prclosetime is not null )d left join ig036 e on d.prid = e.prid left join ig599 h on h.prid = d.prid and h.pivarname = '驳回次数' left join ig599 f on d.prid = f.prid where e.rltype like '0' and f.pivarname in ('变更结果') and e.psname in ('变更评审') and e.rldesc in ('审核通过') group by d.prid ,d.pruserid,d.prusername, d.prclosetime,d.cvalue,f.pivarvalue,e.rldesc,e.psname,d.syscoding,f.pivarname, h.pivarname, h.pivarvalue ) pr where 1=1

select g.ppusername as userName ,g.ppuserid as userID, (select sum(1) from (select d.ppusername,d.prid from ig677 d where d.prclosetime is not null and d.ppstatus = 'Y' and prid in (select prid from ig500 where prpdid like '01102%' and prclosetime like :prclosetime) group by d.ppusername,d.prid) a where a.ppusername = g.ppusername) as disposeNum, sum(case when f.psdcode = 'X' and f.rldesc = '不通过' then 1 else 0 end) as testUpdateRejectNum, sum(case when f.psdcode = 'W' and f.rldesc = '审批不通过' then 1 else 0 end) as testRejectNum, sum(case when f.psdcode = 'V' and f.rldesc = '确认不通过' then 1 else 0 end ) as confirmRejectNum from ig036 f left join ig677 g on f.prid=g.prid and g.ppstatus='Y' and g.prclosetime is not null and g.prpdid like '01102%' where 1=1 and f.prid in ( select distinct(prid) from ig677 where ppstatus = 'Y' and prclosetime is not null and prpdid like '01102%') and rltype like '2' and psname in ('测试更新','测试','确认') and rldesc not in ('删除参与者','添加参与者')

select a.ppid as mainId, a.prid as prid, a.ppusername as username , a.ppuserid as userid, a.ppinittime as starttime, a.ppproctime as endtime, b.pivarvalue as grade, a.ppbacktime as confirmtime from ig677 a left join ig599 b on a.prid = b.prid and pivarname like '事件级别' left join ig599 c on a.prid = c.prid and c.pivarname like '事件来源' where a.prpdid like '01080%' and c.pivarvalue not like '监控告警' and ppstatus = 'W'

select a.ppid as mainId, a.prid as prid, a.ppusername as username , a.ppuserid as userid, a.ppinittime as starttime, a.ppproctime as endtime, b.pivarvalue as grade, a.ppbacktime as confirmtime from ig677 a left join ig599 b on a.prid = b.prid and pivarname like '事件级别' left join ig599 c on a.prid = c.prid and c.pivarname like '事件来源' where a.prpdid like '01080%' and c.pivarvalue like '监控告警' and ppstatus = 'W'

select a.prid as prid, a.prserialnum as prserialnum, a.prdesc as prdesc, a.prstatus as prstatus, a.prtitle as prtitle, a.propentime as propentime, a.prclosetime as prclosetime, a.prusername as prusername, b.pivarvalue as changeclassify, c.pivarvalue as updateplatform, d.pivarvalue as changetype, e.pivarvalue as changereason, f.pivarvalue as changecategory, g.pivarvalue as businessscope, h.pivarvalue as isinfluence, i.pivarvalue as changecontent, j.psdname as orderstatus, a.fingerprint from ig500 a left join ig599 b on a.prid = b.prid and b.pivarname = '变更分类' left join ig599 c on a.prid = c.prid and c.pivarname = '更新平台' left join ig599 d on a.prid = d.prid and d.pivarname = '变更类型' left join ig599 e on a.prid = e.prid and e.pivarname = '变更原因' left join ig599 f on a.prid = f.prid and f.pivarname = '变更类别' left join ig599 g on a.prid = g.prid and g.pivarname = '业务影响范围' left join ig599 h on a.prid = h.prid and h.pivarname = '是否影响业务' left join ig599 i on a.prid = i.prid and i.pivarname = '变更内容' left join ig333 j on j.psdcode = a.prstatus and j.pdid = '0108404' where a.prpdid like '01084%'

select count(*) from (select a.prid as prid, a.prdesc as prdesc, a.prserialnum as prserialnum, a.prstatus as prstatus, a.prtitle as prtitle, a.propentime as propentime, a.prclosetime as prclosetime, a.prusername as prusername, b.pivarvalue as changeclassify, c.pivarvalue as updateplatform, d.pivarvalue as changetype, e.pivarvalue as changereason, f.pivarvalue as changecategory, g.pivarvalue as businessscope, h.pivarvalue as isinfluence, i.pivarvalue as changecontent, j.psdname as orderstatus, a.fingerprint from ig500 a left join ig599 b on a.prid = b.prid and b.pivarname = '变更分类' left join ig599 c on a.prid = c.prid and c.pivarname = '更新平台' left join ig599 d on a.prid = d.prid and d.pivarname = '变更类型' left join ig599 e on a.prid = e.prid and e.pivarname = '变更原因' left join ig599 f on a.prid = f.prid and f.pivarname = '变更类别' left join ig599 g on a.prid = g.prid and g.pivarname = '业务影响范围' left join ig599 h on a.prid = h.prid and h.pivarname = '是否影响业务' left join ig599 i on a.prid = i.prid and i.pivarname = '变更内容' left join ig333 j on j.psdcode = a.prstatus and j.pdid = '0108404' where a.prpdid like '01084%'
select count(1) from ig500 pr left join ig380 pd on pr.prpdid = pd.pdid

select pr.prid, pr.prtype, pr.prserialnum, pr.prtitle, pr.prusername, pr.propentime, pr.prclosetime, pr.prstatus, pr.prsubstatus, pr.prpdid, a.psdname as orderstatus, b.pivarvalue as eventType, c.pivarvalue as eventSource, d.pivarvalue as eventSeverity, e.pivarvalue as eventEmergency, f.pivarvalue as happenTime, g.pivarvalue as handlingMethod, h.pivarvalue as analysis, i.pivarvalue as stoppageName from ig500 pr left join ig380 pd on pr.prpdid = pd.pdid left join ig599 b on pr.prid = b.prid and b.pivarname = '事件分类' left join ig599 c on pr.prid = c.prid and c.pivarname = '事件来源' left join ig599 d on pr.prid = d.prid and d.pivarname = '严重程度' left join ig599 e on pr.prid = e.prid and e.pivarname = '紧急程度' left join ig599 f on pr.prid = f.prid and f.pivarname = '发生时间' left join ig599 g on pr.prid = g.prid and g.pivarname = '处理方法' left join ig599 h on pr.prid = h.prid and h.pivarname = '原因分析' left join ig599 i on pr.prid = i.prid and i.pivarname = '故障系统名称' left join ig333 a on pr.PRPDID = a.pdid and pr.PRSTATUS=a.PSDCODE
